writer.name: 奥古斯特·谢诺阿 August Šenoa

introduction: On its quest of death and terror, plague approaches a small village. The village knows nothing and lives its normal life.On the path of death and horror, the plague approaches a small village. The sign of the cross stops her at the entrance to the village. He sits under the cross and waits. The village suspects nothing. Live everyday life. At the window of a house, little Rade is waiting for his mother Jela to return from the city. Night has already fallen, and the mother is gone. Rade is scared of the gloomy sky, the dark, the creaking door, the bats and runs to her aunt's house next door until her mother comes back. And the plague is waiting... Jela is rushing out of town. hurry home to my son. Kuga stops her and asks her to take her to the village. Jela refuses to do that. The plague threatens. Jela still refuses...! when the plague promises to kill everyone in the village, but to spare her house. Jela took Kuga to the village. The plague spared Jela's house. But Rade was across the street in his aunt's house...
